channel.title: Fire atack on dragon fire shield?
channel.description:
Hello i was playing on a server for a while ago and on the server the dragon firre shield had fire atack....
how can i make it?
please help me, and sorry for bad spelling.
-Meele

item.title: Fire atack on dragon fire shield?
item.dc:creator: @bobbie1990 bobbie1990
item.description:
@bobbie1990 wrote:

sonicforce41:

it is possible in 317 but you don’t control the dragonfire attack. the dragonsheild automatically does it with you clicking operate or anything else.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2009, 06:17:18 am[/size][hr]that website is if you don’t wanna use any other weapon but i think only owners can setup that.

but where i add the code? i cant find it

Read full topic

item.source: Fire atack on dragon fire shield?

item.title: Fire atack on dragon fire shield?
item.dc:creator: @bobbie1990 bobbie1990
item.description:
@bobbie1990 wrote:

sonicforce41:

you cant make it. the dfs is automatically set to hit people with dragonfire when it wants too. you don’t have controll over it! only on 525 servers you can go on your equipment and right click on your dragonfire sheild and click operate. the fire will only work if your fight some1 or something.

ok… so isnt it possible to make it on a 317?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2009, 06:13:37 am[/size][hr]I found this…

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,333040.0.html

but i can get it work…

Read full topic
